definition: To communicate with a higher power, expressing reverence, supplication, or gratitude, often done in a formal or ritualistic manner. It is commonly practiced during religious ceremonies, personal prayers, or in times of distress or need.

examples.german: Ich bete jeden Abend vor dem Schlafengehen.
examples.english: I pray every evening before going to bed.

examples.german: Wir beten gemeinsam vor dem Essen.
Die Nonnen beten den ganzen Tag.
